statements: SELECT * FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_ip_address FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, configuration FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'PC';
SELECT device_ip_address FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router' ORDER BY device_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_ip_address FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Switch' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices WHERE device_ip_address LIKE '192.%';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_ip_address, configuration -> 'OS' AS operating_system FROM connected_devices WHERE configuration ->> 'OS' = 'Ubuntu' AND device_type = 'Server';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, to_jsonb(configuration) AS device_config FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_id FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'phone';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM configurations WHERE setting_name = 'brightness';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM configurations WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' AND device_name LIKE '%iPhone%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, configuration->'color' AS device_color FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Laptop' AND configuration->>'memory' = '8GB' ORDER BY device_name DESC;

SELECT device_name, setting_name, setting_value FROM devices INNER JOIN configurations ON devices.device_id = configurations.device_id WHERE device_type = 'Desktop' ORDER BY device_name ASC, setting_name DESC;

SELECT device_name, COUNT(config_id) AS total_configurations FROM devices LEFT JOIN configurations ON devices.device_id = configurations.device_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING COUNT(config_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_configurations DESC, device_name ASC;

SELECT device_name, setting_name, setting_value FROM devices INNER JOIN configurations ON devices.device_id = configurations.device_id WHERE device_name LIKE '%MacBook%' AND setting_value ILIKE '%SSD%' ORDER BY device_name ASC, setting_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_configurations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM device_configurations WHERE config_value IS NOT NULL ORDER BY config_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type='Mobile';
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM device_configurations WHERE device_id=1;
SELECT device_name, log_message FROM connected_devices JOIN device_logs ON connected_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;
SELECT device_name, log_message, log_timestamp FROM connected_devices JOIN device_logs ON connected_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id WHERE device_id=2;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone';
SELECT device_name, last_connection FROM connected_devices ORDER BY last_connection DESC;
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM device_configurations WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT status_code, status_description FROM device_statuses WHERE status_timestamp >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, last_connection FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY last_connection DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, configuration FROM connected_devices WHERE configuration->>'location' = 'Office';
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE device_status = true;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_status FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM user_devices WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'Office%';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices;
SELECT * FROM device_configurations WHERE config_value = 'stable';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM user_devices WHERE user_role = 'admin';
